feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/494
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/495
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/493
  • Align api field names with swagger.yml by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/496
  • fix(i18n): rename translation keys to order by options by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/499
  • Bump all dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/500
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/501
  • fix(api) Fix WorkoutData json names by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/502
  • fix(api): whoami result not wrapped in APIResponse by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/503
  • Replace delete with htmx by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/504
  • Update swagger by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/505

New Contributors

  • @bastianjoel made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/496

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.2.0...v2.2.1

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Test user returned from API contains no sensitive information by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/506
  • Fix workout equipment not saved by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/509
  • fix(filters): Fix the different filters with translation keys by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/511
  • fix(uint64): Match the bit size of the uint64 IDs by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/512

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.2.1...v2.2.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/513
  • fix(statistics): translate statistics page by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/517
  • Add rowing as a workout type by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/519
  • feat: expose SearchLocations function by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/520
  • fix(steps): Only update steps if they are not zero by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/523
  • fix(measurement): ensure correct measurement timezone handling by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/524
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/525
  • chore(deps): bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 7.0.0 to 8.0.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/527
  • Bump all dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/528
  • Add workout type other by @rafzi in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/529
  • chore(deps): bump actions/setup-go from 5.4.0 to 5.5.0 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/530
  • fix(translation): Fix translation of update button for route route_segments by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/534
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/533
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/535
  • Check the lowercase file extension by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/538
  • Small fixes by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/540
  • feat(workouts): Add Open GPX Tracker for iOS to trusted altitude sources by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/541
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/545
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/a-h/templ from 0.3.865 to 0.3.887 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/543
  • feat(i18n): Add support for Brazilian Portuguese and Turkish languages by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/548
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/546
  • refactor(views): Move markdown rendering to helper by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/549
  • fix(database): Prevent pre-migration error on missing columns by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/550
  • docs(readme): Add reference to Runtastic/Adidas Running import tool by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/551
  • Portuguese (brazilian) translation file by @matheuseduardo in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/553
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/552
  • Align templ version with version from go.mod by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/558
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/555
  • Specify used docker image versions in Dockerfile by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/559
  • Use asset dir directly on development by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/560
  • chore(deps): bump node from 22-alpine to 24-alpine by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/562
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/563
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/564

New Contributors

  • @rafzi made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/529
  • @matheuseduardo made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/553

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.2.2...v2.3.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix the way templ is run by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/566
  • feat: add workout public link deletion by @nicosomb in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/565
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/go-viper/mapstructure/v2 from 2.2.1 to 2.3.0 in the go_modules group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/567
  • build(deps): Update Go and frontend dependencies by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/568
  • Improve import of GPX files with time issues by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/569
  • refactor(workouts): Update icon for matching route segments by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/570
  • fix(ui): Rebuild code after changing templates by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/571
  • fix(ui): change the test on other users sections by @nicosomb in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/572
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/573
  • chore(deps): bump gorm.io/datatypes from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 in the all group by @dependabot in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/575
  • refactor(handlers): Extract calendar API handler by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/578
  • Add cadence stats to workout details by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/576
  • fix(user): Rebuild user show template by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/579
  • feat(statistics): Distinguish aggregation bucket from representative day by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/580
  • feat(calendar): Send workout end times to calendar by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/581
  • Update changelog by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/582

New Contributors

  • @nicosomb made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/565

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.3.0...v2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v2.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(ui): restore the recent activities section by @nicosomb in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/585
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/584
  • Fix AverageSpeedNoPause not updated correctly by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/583
  • chore(deps): bump the all group with 9 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/598
  • chore(deps): bump golang from 1.24.4-alpine to 1.24.5-alpine by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/589
  • feat(web): Add configurable web root by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/599
  • Fix zero division errors for workouts with total duration of 0 by @bastianjoel in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/596
  • feat(calendar): Implement timezone support for calendar view by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/600
  • feat(config): Add web root configuration examples by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/601
  • refactor(conversions): Replace strconv with spf13/cast by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/602
  • feat(metrics): Add enhanced speed and temperature to workouts by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/603
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/604
  • feat(stats): Allow users to customize displayed total statistics by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/611

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v2.4.0...v2.4.1
